item.title: What is Worth Replicating? - SIPS 2020 Unconference session
item.description: Given that most research is original and we have limited resources available for replication, we need guidelines for study selection in replication research. But what makes a study worth replicating? In our unconference session at SIPS this year, we had the pleasure of discussing this problem with fifty-some enthusiastic scholars. Here is a quick summary of what they taught us. First off, we went into this session with our own prior beliefs about what makes a study worth replicating.
